preview.text: Hey! Welcome on my portfolio, feel free to contact me
typed: I am an IT Digital Imaging engineer.
You will learn more about me below.
I hope we can meet someday :D.

lang.anchorText: EN

text.text:
Hey! My name is Vincent, I am a years old French developer. I am an engineer who graduated from the IT Digital Imaging in the Ecole Supérieure d'Ingénieurs de Rennes (ESIR - Rennes 1). I wish you a welcome to my portfolio!

For more than years, computing, media, and electronics have taken more and more part of my daily life. Since my high school years, I started little by little to lead various projects. Which allowed me to discover computer science and to lead myself towards the development of software applications.

During my schooling, I obtained a UTD in Electrical Engineering and Industrial Computer Science which allowed me to discover electronics and industrial computer science. After this year, I decided to go on international mobility at the University of the West of Scotland (UWS) in Glasgow to learn 3D through a Bsc Game Development. After that, I joined an engineering school where I had the opportunity to follow a unique training in France because it was dedicated to the vast field of digital imaging.

I put my skills into practice during different internships. In particular, within innovative companies with strong expertise, either in startup such as Askelys in which I developed a 3D WebGL Unity interface for their semantic web API. Or, either during my professionalization in the Immersive Medical Technologies lab at the b<>com Technology Research Institute, by my contribution to the development of an open-source Augmented Reality Framework.

All these challenges allowed me to improve myself personally and professionally. You can find below some of my projects. Feel free to contact me to learn more about my profile.

Cheers

contestArena.title: Contest Arena
contestArena.abstract: Contest Arena is a contest website (designed for mobile) allowing to compete with your friends on live on competitions (ex: Miss France, Eurovision)

jekyll.title: Jekyll
jekyll.abstract: Use Jekyll to publish (markdown with Github API) and share easily tips with my family during the lockdown

asciiArt.title: ASCII Art
asciiArt.abstract: Process an image to create an ASCII Art effect

githubApi.title: Github API
githubApi.abstract: Pick up Github REST API to automatically generate portfolio with Github's project and keep update website and my repositories

bcom.title: b<>com training contract
bcom.abstract:
Professional training contract (2019-2020)
Report and slides of my works at IRT b<>com

get.description:
Report and slides of my professional training contract at b<>com

I worked for one year as an R&D engineer in the Immersive Medical Technologies laboratory specialized in computer vision and video. During this year, I contributed to the development of an open-source C++17 Framework: SolAR Framework. My main works concerned the development of a Unity plugin for Android, the support of the continuous integration of the framework, the development of modules and a sample to use depth cameras like the Intel RealSense

asymmetryICP.title: Asymmetry ICP
asymmetryICP.abstract:
This project rely on “An algorithm to map asymmetries of bilateral objects in point clouds” - Benoît Combès & al.
This algorithm able to automatically quantify the local asymmetries of bilateral structures in a point cloud by using Iterative Closest Point (ICP)

lunaAndHelios.title: A Story of Luna & Helios
lunaAndHelios.abstract:
This game has been released during the Game Jam 2020.
This event aimed was to build a video game in 35 hours on the subject : “Safe in the dark”

get.description:
This game has been released during the Orange Game Jam 2020. The aim of this event was to build a video game in 35 hours on the subject : Safe in the dark

More informations are available in the GitHub README

Gameplay video

tensors.title: Tensor directed stylization
tensors.abstract:
This project rely on “Tensors-directed simulation of strokes for image stylization with hatching and contours” - David TSCHUMPERLE
Its describe an algorithm to generate sketches from color images directed by an image-dependent tensor-valued geometry

ar.title: Augmented Reality
ar.abstract: This project aimed to learn the basics of pose estimation for augmented reality. It relies on OpenCV library to process frame and computes pose estimation

crowdChoice.title: Crowd Choice
crowdChoice.abstract: A one-week training course in partnership with IGR-IAE Rennes whose objective was to create a startup with all the constraints linked to entrepreneurship

get.description:
A one-week training course in partnership with IGR-IAE Rennes whose objective was to create a startup with all the constraints linked to entrepreneurship.

Crowd Choice is an event organization company based on a participative financing model. The goal is to produce themed evenings (musical style and foreign culture) tailored to the needs of the audience, thanks to surveys prepared in advance. According to the votes of the community the events are set up in order to be submitted to a crowdfunding.

hdr.title: HDR
hdr.abstract: Experimentation of features related to High Dynamic Range (HDR) with OpenCV library

get.description:
No streaming access aren't available on WebGL with Unity.
As this game has been developed for OS, use Windows executable to have access to options and sounds and others features in the game

ray.title: Path tracing
ray.abstract:
This project aimed was to implement features of a Ray tracing engine and optimization structures related to it
Then in a second part Global Illumination and Path tracing have been added to this project.
